H0.text: In the poem 'The Charge of the Light Brigade' by Tennyson, how many 'rode into the valley of death'. Five Hundred (500)

H1.text: In the poem 'The Charge of the Light Brigade' by Tennyson, how many 'rode into the valley of death'. One Thousand (1000)

H2.text: In the poem 'The Charge of the Light Brigade' by Tennyson, how many 'rode into the valley of death'. Two Hundred (200)

H3.text: In the poem 'The Charge of the Light Brigade' by Tennyson, how many 'rode into the valley of death'. SIX HUNDRED (600)

A4.text: 607 sabres took part in the charge.

A5.text: about 670 men took part in the charge.
